name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save with Indexit.ai - your lifestyle & knowledge AI assistant

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Save any web pages with the help of our AI assisted tool, Summarize, Explore and Dig deeper, ALL with just one simple click!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Imagine having a lifestyle & knowledge AI assistant: She knows your interests really well, organizes your saved links and facilitates your exploration of any topic!

Start with keeping track of your online interests with Indexit.ai - Our chrome extension offers a simple way to save any page, organize with ease and get AI summaries. And on top of that, Indexit.ai offers AI assisted experiences to help you explore any content or question!

Join us to share and discover the best of the web and build your own Index for your curiosity.

To get started, just log in or sign up for Indexit.ai for a free account.
